verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Revenge|strong="H5360"\w* first \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Madianites, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w so|strong="H0853"\w* thou shalt \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* forthwith \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: Arm \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* fight, \w who|strong="H0376"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w take|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w revenge|strong="H5360"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Madianites.

\w Let|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H7971"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* chosen \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w war|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w they|strong="H3478"\w* gave \w a|strong="H3478"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* every \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w*, \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w is|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w say|strong="H3478"\w*, \w twelve|strong="H6240"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H8147"\w* well appointed \w for|strong="H6635"\w* \w battle|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w with|strong="H3027"\w* Phinees \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w delivered|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w sound|strong="H8643"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w fought|strong="H6633"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Madianites \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* overcome \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H2145"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w Evi|strong="H0189"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Recem, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Sur, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hur|strong="H2354"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Rebe, \w five|strong="H2568"\w* princes \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* nation: \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Beer \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w killed|strong="H2026"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w took|strong="H7617"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w women|strong="H0802"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w captives|strong="H7617"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w goods|strong="H2428"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w possessions|strong="H4735"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w plundered|strong="H0962"\w*:

\w And|strong="H0784"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H0784"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* villages, \w and|strong="H0784"\w* castles, \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w burned|strong="H8313"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0120"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w carried|strong="H3947"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w booty|strong="H7998"\w*, \w and|strong="H0120"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w had|strong="H0853"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w both|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H0120"\w* \w and|strong="H0120"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* all \w the|strong="H0853"\w* multitude \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w But|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* rest \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w things|strong="H0834"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* use \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w carried|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w plains|strong="H6160"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w beside|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w princes|strong="H5387"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* synagogue \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* without \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* being \w angry|strong="H7107"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w chief|strong="H8269"\w* \w officers|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* tribunes, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* centurions \w that|strong="H6485"\w* \w were|strong="H2428"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*,
\w Said|strong="H0559"\w*: Why \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* saved \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w women|strong="H5347"\w*?

\w Are|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w these|strong="H2007"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w*, \w that|strong="H1697"\w* deceived \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w counsel|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* transgress \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sin \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Phogor, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H6465"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H1121"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* punished?

\w Therefore|strong="H6258"\w* \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w are|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w male|strong="H2145"\w* sex, even \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H2945"\w*: \w and|strong="H0376"\w* put \w to|strong="H0376"\w* death \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w women|strong="H0802"\w*, \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* carnally \w known|strong="H3045"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* girls, \w and|strong="H0802"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w women|strong="H0802"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* virgins save \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H3605"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* stay without \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*. \w He|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* hath \w killed|strong="H2026"\w* \w a|strong="H3117"\w* \w man|strong="H5315"\w*, \w or|strong="H3117"\w* \w touched|strong="H5060"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w killed|strong="H2026"\w*, \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* \w purified|strong="H2398"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6086"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* spoil, \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w garment|strong="H0899"\w*, \w or|strong="H6086"\w* \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w*, \w or|strong="H6086"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w thing|strong="H3627"\w* \w made|strong="H4639"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* use, \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w skins|strong="H5785"\w*, \w or|strong="H6086"\w* hair \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w goats|strong="H5795"\w*, \w or|strong="H6086"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, \w shall|strong="H2398"\w* \w be|strong="H3605"\w* \w purified|strong="H2398"\w*.

\w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w spoke|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w army|strong="H6635"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* fought, \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* manner: \w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w ordinance|strong="H2708"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*:

\w Gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* lend, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w tin|strong="H0913"\w*,

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H0834"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w purified|strong="H2891"\w* \w by|strong="H0784"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, \w but|strong="H0389"\w* \w whatsoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* abide \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* sanctified \w with|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* expiation:

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* \w your|strong="H0935"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* being \w purified|strong="H2891"\w*, \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w afterwards|strong="H0310"\w* \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*.
\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*:

\w Take|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sum|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w things|strong="H7218"\w* \w that|strong="H0929"\w* \w were|strong="H0120"\w* \w taken|strong="H5375"\w* \w both|strong="H0120"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*, thou \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* princes \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* multitude:

\w And|strong="H3318"\w* thou shalt \w divide|strong="H2673"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* spoil equally, \w between|strong="H0996"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* fought \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w between|strong="H0996"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* rest \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* multitude.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt separate \w a|strong="H4480"\w* \w portion|strong="H4480"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w that|strong="H4480"\w* fought \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w were|strong="H0376"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w as|strong="H5315"\w* well \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w persons|strong="H5315"\w* \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* asses \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, because \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* firstfruits \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* moiety \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* thou shalt \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fiftieth|strong="H2572"\w* head \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w persons|strong="H0120"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* asses, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thou shalt \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w watch|strong="H8104"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3967"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w spoil|strong="H0957"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w army|strong="H6635"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w taken|strong="H1961"\w*, \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w seventy-five|strong="H7657"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*,
Seventy-two \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*,
Sixty-one \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* asses:

\w And|strong="H0802"\w* thirty-two \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w persons|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w female|strong="H0802"\w* sex, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w* \w men|strong="H0120"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3967"\w* \w one|strong="H1961"\w* \w half|strong="H4275"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* given \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H3318"\w* \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H6635"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w battle|strong="H6635"\w*, \w to|strong="H1961"\w* wit, \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* thirty-seven \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*:
